UPDATE order_shop SET sku_status = 1,update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND username = #{username} AND sku_status = 0
UPDATE order_shop SET order_status = #{orderStatus},update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND username = #{username}
mapper.select: SELECT c.phone username,a.produce_station_no belongStationNo,b.sku_id skuId,b.sku_name skuName,b.sku_count skuCount,c.price skuPrice FROM order_jd a JOIN product_order_jd b ON b.order_id = a.order_id JOIN product c ON c.belong_station_no = a.produce_station_no AND c.sku_id=b.sku_id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId}
